channel.title: Warps
channel.description:
I have seen that there are no warps because they are abused. Now, i think we need more then 1 teleport spot since most people have multiple houses far from each other so then this plugin
http://forum.hey0.net/showthread.php?tid=1254
i hope you add this cuz it's awesum

item.title: Warps
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:8, topic:380572”]Yes, bukkit is going to be the replacement for hey0. I may start testing it in a few days.

As to this specific plugin, looks like it could be really abused doesn’t it? While I also have homes far apart from each other and a teleport would be convenient, it would take away from having to navigate to different points on the map. It just seems like that is part of the game for me.[/quote]I agree we shouldn’t place warps, but after reading the thread that was posted, it’s more of a logging system that seems it would work great to help stop griefing.

Read full topic

item.title: Warps
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Yes, bukkit is going to be the replacement for hey0. I may start testing it in a few days.

As to this specific plugin, looks like it could be really abused doesn’t it? While I also have homes far apart from each other and a teleport would be convenient, it would take away from having to navigate to different points on the map. It just seems like that is part of the game for me.

Read full topic

item.title: Warps
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:3, topic:380572”]Do you guys realize that for every mod we add right now, with hey0, means that in the next week or so when we switch to bukkit and the latest minecraft that nothing will work anymore? It’s just a bad idea.[/quote]Well, we don’t know how they are going to implement plugins, it really depends on how much changes. But I agree, until we see the changes we shouldn’t be adding a ton of new mods.

As for the plugin itself, I love the idea. If Bukkit turns out to be somewhat similar I may end up converting it.

Read full topic

item.title: Warps
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Do you guys realize that for every mod we add right now, with hey0, means that in the next week or so when we switch to bukkit and the latest minecraft that nothing will work anymore? It’s just a bad idea.

So they are working on a 1.2 mod?
I thought it wasn’t going to happen.

Read full topic

item.title: Warps
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:4, topic:380572”]sets one tele at haven, one at akat
tele haven, kill everyone
tele back to akat, get food
repeat
Problem?
In short, no.[/quote]I see what you did there.

Read full topic
